entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
